Growing Up NYC
  • Patterns

Alert Banner

The Alert Banner Object is a fixed container that contains a string, notifying the user of temporary information about programs, events, etc. A cookie for the notification is created when a user closes the object. The alert will therefore not expire until the cookie has expired, based on the number of days you set, if you did not specify the number of days through an argument to the *alertBanner() * class, the cookie expiration date with be defaulted to 360 days. Click here for a demo page to clear the cookie and show the banner incase you closed the alert banner.

Notification Banner
Alert Content
<div aria-describedby="dialog-desc-notification" aria-labelledby="dialog-title-notification" class="o-alert-banner hidden" data-alert="notification" data-js="alert-banner-notification" id="banner-notification" role="dialog">
  <div class="show-for-screen-reader" id="dialog-title-notification">Notification Banner</div>
  <div class="o-alert-banner__content" id="dialog-desc-notification"><div class="o-container">Alert Content</div></div>
  <button aria-label="close" class="o-alert__button" data-js="alert-controller" data-toggle="banner-notification" type="button">
    <svg class="icon--small" role="img">
      <title>Close</title>
      <use xlink:href="#icon-close"></use>
    </svg>
  </button>
</div>
